str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From peri and pateo; to tread all around, i.e. Walk at large; figuratively, to live, deport oneself, follow.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Flesh, body, human nature, materiality; kindred.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle - 1st Person Plural
str2: To wage war, fight, serve as a soldier; fig: of the warring lusts against the soul.
A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).
Flesh, body, human nature, materiality; kindred.
